snippet: THE visit to Europe by Sumner Welles, American Under-Secretary of State, has brought to a head the whole question of war aims, which  has been constantly and widely discussed in Britain and in somewhat different ......

headline.main: "IS IT THE GERMANS OR THEIR LEADERS?"; A debate, reminiscent of the great argument of 1919, is revived in Allied countries by the visit of Sumner Welles.

lead_paragraph: THE visit to Europe by Sumner Welles, American Under-Secretary of State, has brought to a head the whole question of war aims, which has been constantly and widely discussed in Britain and in somewhat different ...
